title: Feature Transformations with Ensembles of Trees
description: In this lab, we will learn how to transform features into a higher dimensional, sparse space using an ensemble of trees. We will then train a linear model on these features. We will use different types of ensemble methods including Random Forest and Gradient Boosting and compare their performance.

meta.title: Machine Learning | Feature Engineering | Ensemble Methods
meta.description: Learn how to transform features into a higher dimensional, sparse space using an ensemble of trees and train a linear model on these features. Explore Random Forest and Gradient Boosting techniques.
meta.keywords: machine learning, feature engineering, ensemble methods, random forest, gradient boosting

i18n.title: 使用树集成进行特征转换
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习如何使用树集成将特征转换到更高维的稀疏空间。然后，我们将在这些特征上训练一个线性模型。我们将使用不同类型的集成方法，包括随机森林和梯度提升，并比较它们的性能。

meta.title: 机器学习 | 特征工程 | 集成方法
meta.description: 学习如何使用树集成将特征转换到更高维的稀疏空间，并在这些特征上训练一个线性模型。探索随机森林和梯度提升技术。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, 特征工程, 集成方法, 随机森林, 梯度提升

steps.title: 使用随机森林和梯度提升进行特征转换
